title: Content Type
description: TYPO3 CMS Content Blocks Content Type

name.description: Unique identifier for the Content Block in the format vendor/content-block-name

title.description: The title of the Content Block

prefixFields.description: Field identifiers will be prefixed with the Content Block name.

priority.description: The priority is used to prioritize certain Content Blocks in the loading order.

basics.description: Basics contain a set of fields, which are appended after the fields definition.

fields.description: The root fields definition of the Content Block. Define your field types here.
